operations.notes: In order to get a parameters value, you must give the type, the mac address and the parameter name of the parameter, by calling /mobileclient/get?type=....,macadd=....,type=.... .

In order to set a parameters value, you must give the type, the mac address, the parameter name and the value of the parameter, by calling /mobileclient/set?type=....,macadd=....,type=....,value=.... .
